name: Love Letter
storyline:
She left a letter...

Love letter is a short, retro inspired, horror game.

You and your classmates went to school at night to break the curse of a ghost girl who is hunting the building.

Run, hide and throw trash cans to survive.
Put the letter together to free her soul.
